Name: Battle Droid T1
About the game: FEATURES Old school metroidvania style game play with a similar level of old school difficulty. Over 150 areas to explore and clear of enemies. Select from five unique special weapons to equip. Collect gears and use them to upgrade and replenish your droids shield and ammo supply. Great soundtrack. Saves local high score stats and military ranks. Quit and restore game at any time without losing progress.
